QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT eventdate, patid, staffid, cast(immstype as varchar(20)) +'-'+ cast(compound AS varchar(20))+'-' + cast(medcode as varchar(20)) as immun_key, cast((cast(patid as bigint)*100000000)+(year(eventdate) *10000)+ (month(eventdate)*100)+ day(eventdate) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, right(patid,3) as care_site_id FROM immunisation JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID WHERE status = 1 and eventdate is not NULL
